cells.data:
-- fromEnum :: Enum a => a -> Int
on fromEnum(x)
    set c to class of x
    if c is boolean then
        if x then
            1
        else
            0
        end if
    else if c is text then
        if x â‰  "" then
            id of x
        else
            missing value
        end if
    else
        x as integer
    end if
end fromEnum
